titleStmt.title: The VVelch-mans life, teath and periall Together vvith a long narrow prod list, of the care her tooke in hers life-time, to make awle hims frend and acquaintance merry at her teath, abscribing the manner of hers finerall, [sic] with faire cost bestowed upon them that comes to hims periall.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Burton at the signe of the Horshooe in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries, London, England.

place.placeName: the signe of the Horshooe in Smithfield
